alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 05 at 11:38AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arkansas and southeast Oklahoma, including the following counties, in southwest Arkansas, Hempstead, Howard, Little River, Nevada and Sevier. In southeast Oklahoma, McCurtain. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered showers and thunderstorms will continue to move across portions of southwest Arkansas today, possibly resulting in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier
